description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 2024-03-27 by 14:00 EDT All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide cleaning services at the Blackdown Cadet Training Centre (BCTC) located in Borden, Ontario to Department of National Defence (DND), Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Borden
full_summary:
## Notice of Competition - W3935-24P001 Cleaning Services

### Tender Reference Number
WS4389263990

### Amendment Number
2

### Publication Date
February 29, 2024

### Tender Closing Date
March 27, 2024, 14:00 EDT
{: #notice-of-competition-tender-closing-date}

### Amendment Date
March 18, 2024

### Expected Contract Start Date
None

### Expected Contract End Date
April 30, 2025

### Tender Status
Expired

### Service Type
Cleaning and Janitorial Services, UNSPSC: 76110000

### Procurement Method
Competitive, Open Bidding

### Notice Type
Request for Proposal

### Selection Criteria
Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Region of Opportunity
None

#### Regions of Delivery
* New Tecumseth
* Barrie

### Contracting Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
{: #departments-of-public-works}
#### Address
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
{: #addresses-and-phone-numbers}

### End User Entity
Department of National Defence (DND)
{: #end-user-entity}
#### Address
101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2

### Bid Submission
All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by March 27, 2024, 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after the designated time will be declared non-responsive.

### Contact
Jason Scott, (SPAC/PSPC)
jason.scott@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
{: #contact-person}
{: .left} {: right}

### Notice URL
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18948364?extsite=MTg5NDgzNjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
